title: Wilson's tales of the borders and of Scotland :
author: Wilson, John Mackay
snippet: I was soon again a constant visitor at Oak Lodge; and in a few months I had the happiness of calling Emmeline my own. I have been now married three years, and have every day greater cause to bless the happy chance which first led me to Oak Lodge. My excellent father-in-law lives with us, and delio;hts in spending his day in nursing his little grandchildi-en.

title: Wilson's tales of the borders and of Scotland :
author: Wilson, John Mackay
snippet: Yes, tears; for joy can weep as well as grief. I was soon again a constant visitor at Oak Lodge; and in a few months I had the happiness of calling Emmeline my own. I have been now married three years, and have every day greater cause to bless the happy chance which first led me to Oak Lodge.
